ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: MORE then one account?? please explain
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you tried replacing your modem wire? The one that plugs into the wall? They can go bad, and it s a cheap fix that can help sometimes on a noisy line, if
ygData.messageBody:
Have you tried replacing your modem wire? The one that plugs into the wall? They can go bad, and it's a cheap fix that can help sometimes on a "noisy" line, if nothing else is really noisy (like the phone).
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, March 15, 2002 3:28 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: MORE then one account?? please explain


> there are hints about the bandwidth EQ needs on the official EQ site,
> but it is somewhat hard to find ... it is sort of information for ISPs
> so they know how much traffic within an hour or so can occur playing
> this game.
>

Well, when I was connecting around 40k we could have 3 people on at the same
time and not have lag too badly.
but our phone lines here just suck so bad. We can barely hear over the phone
but the phone company keeps saying there's nothing wrong with our lines.
Not that I'm bitter mind you. ;-)
luv,
-Su
